headline: PLAIN SPEECH GERMANY'S NEED, RADICALS CRY; Conservatives Join Socialists in Demanding a Precise Outline of War Aims. PLEASING RUMOR IN BERLIN "An Agreeable Political Event," Said to be Imminent, Explaining the Chancellor's Silence. Would Disclose Terms to Russia. Vorwaerts Hopes to Detach Russia. PLAIN SPEECH GERMANY'S NEED Blame Chancellor for Long War. Plans for Reichstag Districting.
